NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH) will use funds for a mix of interventions designed to significantly expand addressing obesity, physical activity, and nutrition through policy, systems and environmental
change.  The proposed interventions build on existing programs, leverage recently enacted policies, and identify
appropriate areas for further policy change.
These interventions have been selected from CDCs evidence-based menu of media, access, point-of-decision, price, and social support strategies.
